======Randomly creates uber drone spawners.======

= Description =

Randomly replaces asw_drone spawners with asw_drone_uber spawners. 

=== Usage ===

`asw_carnage_randomize_uber 0.24`

This give each asw_drone spawner a 24% chance of becoming an asw_drone_uber spawner. Keep in mind that THIS DOES NOT MEAN that exactly 24% of spawners will become asw_drone_uber spawners.
